caption: Delicious, perfect pie

This pizza restaurant was awesome! I never thought that their workers would be so swift and friendly to their many clients. Last night, I never hesitated to dine with them. I had a wonderful evening because of the accommodation of this …
Great pizza spot! Vegan friendly but you honestly can’t tell. Highly recommend!

Just had two of them yesterday, soo good! Very good dough!! Toppings on point! Neapolitan pizza has been my favorite since I had the original in Naples, Italy. This place makes it very similar! I hope they’ll open a dine in location so you can enjoy the pizza with wine. Pro tip, you must eat it in the car right away 😅

This tiny place is amazing. We have been searching for good pizza and Bare Knuckle is most like the best I have eaten. The TKO seduces you with that truffle oil! The Cherry Pie is unique and sublime. Prices are great, the crust is perfection. Awesome hand tossed crust and fresh ingredients. It was worth the wait and the cost.

Hands down my favorite pizza place in the Bay. Amazing vegan cheeses and meat options. Not vegan but lactose intolerant so having a great dairy free option plus delicious crust and toppings make this place extra special
Hands down best pizza I have had in CA. And who would have thought I would find it in Chinatown?
So fresh and great service!
No doubt it's pricey, but it's really good.  The Portobello Mushroom with Truffle Oil is a MUST!
Fantastic and delicious pizza ! Unfortunately they were incredibly busy and I think that contributed to my crust being super soggy upon enjoyment .
Best pizza in town. Superb vegan options.

Espo's actually for a pizza joint around the corner named Basil Pizza because bare Knuckles Pizza is only open on weekends so if you want a top Quality Pizza absolutely delicious cross go around the corner the place called Basil Pizza I …

The tastiest pizza and pasta in the area! I was really pleased with the taste of their pizza and pasta, and I must say that this restaurant is truly one of the best. I really enjoyed my stay here and kudos to the staff that was able to attend to all of our requests cordially. Thank you so much! You guys are the best!

Came to sf during the covid pandemic to be an egg donor, and got dumped by my long time bf over the phone while here. The half and half tko/cherry pie gave me a dose of serotonin I desperately needed. Give Bare Knuckle Pizza your money, and make them your primary care physician.
Excellent pizza. Vegans and meat eaters will be happy here.

It's my first time here and the experience was great. They have good food and friendly staff here. They were my favorite pizza restaurant now. They had good selections of toppings and ingredients, too. Their price is very competitive to …
Love the cherry pie & vegan cheese option
My favorite pizza in the Bay area by far. I'm here at least 3x per week. Delicious!

This tiny place is amazing. We have been searching for good pizza and Bare Knuckle is most like the best I have eaten . The TKO seduces you with that truffle oil! The Cherry Pie is unique and sublime. Prices are great, the crust is perfection. This the only place for pizza for us now.
Best pizza I have tasted since moving to CA

We only went here because they said they offered vegan pizza, which can be hard to find back home, but in this area it seems to be we have a wide variety of vegan restaurant options, so we thought we'd see how Oakland does vegan pizza. IT'S …
The best pizza I've had outside of Rome, and amazing vegan options.
Vegan pizza with moz from Butchers Son
Amazing dough, and great vegan pizza options.
Had a very good vegan pepperoni pizza. Was craving it and their pizza pie hit the spot.
Vegan cheez and vegan meats are delicious!!! This pizza is sooo tasty!
Food was good. Staff is nice. 10/10 will return.

Pretty Oaklandish digs. Fun, tight, twisty, steep squeeze to the upstairs: Although there is a shelf of fun games, it's a tight blank space so you're not missing too much if you're handicapped. The outdoor seating with a prime view up and …
Amazing pizza very fast, not a lot of seating but good for a quick bite before you hit the bars

I'm in town for business and staying at a hotel around the corner. Thank you Yelp for helping me find this place. I had the TNT pizza, and they warned me about the Thai peppers when I ordered it.  One Thai pepper was placed on each of the …

The pizza was not cooked through and the crust still had uncooked dough on the inside of it. Not in the edge of the crust but in the center of the pizza too. Worse, when I tried to show the owner / manager fellow, he tried to write me off …
Easily my favorite pizza in California

Not usually a huge fan of vegan pizza, Viet and the rest of the folks there crush it with excellent toppings, some great crust, and an overall selection of pizzas that are just unbeatable. Add to that they are just all around good folks and any time I’m in Oakland and they are open, I’ll stop in
Wood fired pizza is always delicious
(Translated by Google) I really like it, I will almost always eat there for lunch  (Original) Me gusta mucho casi siempre voy a comer allí en my lunch
Expensive and of mediocre quality

Pizza was horrible for 16-18 dollars, the dough was like bread, there was so much sauce it was soupy and the prosciutto I had on my pizza was more boiled than crispy. And to top it all off the pizza was burnt.
My favourite pizza spot! Love their pear, arugula and Gorgonzola, pepperoni, mushroom and truffle oil pizza. Small joint with limited seating.

Great place for vegans to enjoy satisfying pizza. No slices as far as I know and the single pizzas aren't quite enough for two so you'll end up having to get two (at ~$16-$18 apiece, that's pricey). The vegan cheese is great (from Butcher's …
Yummy and vegan options available for my gf partner!
Divine margherita. As usual.

Great italian/california neapolitan style pizza, thin hand stretched slightly sour dough with nice 'pull/bite' and some cherry wood oven char. Light on the  interesting quality toppings, like dried cherries, gorgonzola, mozzarella, …
Best pizza in Oakland. Go early - they run out by 8 pm some nights.
The vegan pizza is next level. The normal pizza is mind blowing. So freaking good.
best pizza in oakland!
Love this place! They have tons of options, vegan and regular. Great staff and always fresh
Delicious vegan pizza, best I've ever had.  My only complaint is that it's a bit overpriced for the small amount of pizza you get.
Quality hight and pizza topped with fresh organic ingredients. 🔝
The best vegan pizza I've had in the bay!

You can taste the chef’s passion for ingredients and baking in all the pies. The TKO knocks me off my feet everytime. I simply don’t get these people complaining about prices... call Domino’s or better yet Costco. My only advice to the chef …

Possibly the best pizza I've ever had, seriously. 4-stars because they have terrible hours, often run out, and have consistency issues. Also, stop asking if I want Vegan or Non-vegan. Non-vegan is standard and should be assumed by default.
Delicious Vegan pizza!
Uh. May. Zing. Many good vegan options!
Tasty pizza. Just the right size. Nice staff. Enjoyed playing Jenga while waiting on our food!
Great environment with wild and creative pies.

A fantastic pizza joint working out of a compact space. The staff was nice. They offer meat and vegan options of incredible pizzas! Limited dining area inside or take out. You can only order whole 12 in. pizzas, and if you chose to dine in they do not offer take home boxes.

Oh boy.... You'd better LOVE his pizza. I pretty much write my reviews honestly and how I view the food. So after dining at Bare Knuckle Pizza, I decided to write a review regarding my experience. We had the non-vegan Roman. The pizza was …
Great vegan pizza! We had the Roman and were not disappointed. I usually don't eat vegan cheese, but they use one from The Butcher's Son and it's amazing!
Love the crust and an absolutely fantastic topping selection!

It's tiny so dining-in can get challenging but the pizza is sooooooo goooooood. And if you want to get through vegan-uary while stuffing your face damn their vegan options are great. The vegan mozz is the best non-cheese cheese I've ever had. But it's that crust that makes this place my new favorite pizza in the Town.

Hole in the wall pizza joint with limited days & hours and very limited space downstairs and up above in what I would call a converted "attic storage space". Take Out seems like it would be a popular option. Expensive 12" pizzas, very …

This place is amazing. Ever since our trip to NYC over two years ago, we've talked about that pizza. We have a new favorite! This beat new York pizza hands down. Our party ordered three pizzas, all vegan and vegetarian (don't worry, they …
Absolutely Divine wood fire pizzas!

Poorly made pizza: the toppings slide right off. Not sure if these peoe really know what their doing.  Their hours are ridiculous: it's almost always closed as it's only open for 16 hours a week! Pizza on Monday night? Go to a different …
Awesome pizza, terrible hours, also they sell out of pizza pretty often so call before you roll over there.
We made this spot a gathering point for friends and ended up pouring into the sidewalks and selling the place out. Beautiful and delicious pizzas paired with a nice drink selection.
Great vegan pizzas!  All choices. Prices reasonable.  Seating not great.  Tight, downstairs.  Too hot upstairs.
Awesome vegan pies and cozy space
Some of the best pizza in Oakland. Frustrating that they're closed 3 days of the week.
So good! The crust is amazing, very good pizza
Bare Knuckle's vegan pizzas are absolutely some of the best pizzas I have had in Oakland (vegan or otherwise).

I love this place! Had the Vegan Roman and Vegan Supremo, and both were delicious. The crust is amazing! Staff is very helpful and friendly, and service is quick. Plus the space is adorable. I definitely recommend. :)
Amazingly delicious vegan pies with Butcher's Son (BS) cheese & meats.  One bite & I can't stop.  I can finish 2 vegan TKO's w/bacon.  (TKO- Mushrooms, BS mozzarella & parm, & truffle oil- yum.)

Great place to try some new styles of pizza with many vegetarian and meat options to choose from. The wait time can be a bit painful but there's a cozy attic for additional seating (no windows though). Also it took a few times trying to …
Best vegan pizza I've ever had. Hands down!
Best pizza in the Bay area.

Excelled neapolitan pizzas. Nice lick of char, high quality toppings, and nice chew on the back end of the crust. Can't ask for much more. T.n.t. Can be pretty spicy, so buyer beware on that one. Oh yeah, staff is crazy nice too.
Great vegan options
They have a good variety of awesome vegan pizzas!
Excellent customer service. Alot of unique pizza types, highly recommend
Pricey but totally worth it. Best vegan pizza I’ve had. Could be a bit bigger for the price.
They are one of the few places that uses wooden oven 😍. The food taste is amazing and the employees treat very well their cutomers
P fricken good. Dough could use a touch more salt but cooked perfectly. Upstairs was cozy.
Amazing pizza!
Expensive for average pizza.
Best vegan pizza in the Bay area. Period.
Delicious! I highly recommend getting the pizza with the mushrooms on top. I forget the name. It has truffle oil too, which is just perfect!
Best vegan pizza I've ever had!  Who ever makes the vegan cheese, has the chemistry down to the T!
Hands down best pizzas in town, vegan or not!
The pizza was tasty but very wet. This lead to a soggy crust. There was a puddle of liquid when I finished my pizza.
The Best itallian pizza in the Bay!
Doughy crust and high price is not worth the 1-hour wait, alas.
Pies are small and no slices. Lots of topping options though, vegan too. Only open on wednesday-friday.
Freaking good pizza, beware though their vegan bacon is awesome
Half the menu is vegan and the owner is super friendly. $10 margarita pizzas on Wednesdays. And they carry Nutritional Yeast for vegans.

The pizzas here are pretty good and freshly made, but may be pricey for what you get. Hence the 4stars. The staff is friendly and the owner is engaging to you as a customer. I feel very welcomed and at home when I ate here. There seems to …
Amazing vegan pizza and the owner is super cool too!
Quirky small place that serves delicious gluten free and vegan options
Excellent!! I ordered a veggies pizza (no cheese) and it was amazing! The best crust!
Awesome pizza!  Had the Pear and a custom.  Both were unbelievable
Great service, great vegan pies
Best vegan pizza in a long, long time.
Amazing pizza and cool space. They are open late and have great pizza options as well as vegan pizza options. Some of the best pizza I've had in downtown oakland.
Thanks
Delicious! Great service! We’ll be back!
🍕 is really good, but expensive.
Best vegan pizza I've ever had. This place is amazing. The owner is a cool guy.

Damn good Vegan pizza. I had the The Roman done GF. Next day I had to go back and get the Babe it was so good. I have no idea how they make such a nice Gluten Free base. But whatever magic they use it's working for them. And both times I went the wait time was around 10-15 minutes.
Best pizza in Oakland. Best vegan pizza in the Bay area.
Delicious, but a little pricey for the size.

Really small hole in the wall place. Downstairs has some seating inside and out, you order right by the door. And there are more seating up stairs.  Menu pretty straight forward, they make it after you order it. You are looking at at least …
Great place to have a last minute date night, the pizza is great and the staff are so warm and welcoming!
Good flavors,selection and service
Oh YES! Best brick oven vegan pizza EVER! At no extra charge high quality vegan ingredients are made into the same options as the meat eaters have. If only they were open for lunch..,
Pizza was great. The problem I had was they told me the pizza would be done in 20 minutes. I had other priorities and 20 minutes was fine, but it took 45 minutes.
Great pizza place. There are seatings upstairs. It would be better if they have draft beer options within the restaurant.

Their Vegan Roman is the best vegan pizza I've ever had.  In fact, its one of the best pizzas of any kind I've ever had.
Possibly the best pizza in the bay and one of the closest to a true Italian style pizza
